00008 namespace RobotFootballCore.RouteObjects
00009 {
00010     public class LineSegment : RouteSegment
00011     {
00012         
00013         public LineSegment(PointF startPoint, PointF endPoint)
00014         {
00015             StartPoint = startPoint;
00016             EndPoint = endPoint;
00017         }
00018 
00019         public override float Length
00020         {
00021             get
00022             {
00023                 var xLength = StartPoint.X - EndPoint.X;
00024                 var yLength = StartPoint.Y - EndPoint.Y;
00025 
00026                 return (float)Math.Sqrt(xLength * xLength + yLength * yLength);
00027             }
00028         }
00029 
00030         public override void Draw(Graphics field)
00031         {
00032             field.DrawLine(RouteSegment.DrawingPen, StartPoint, EndPoint);
00033         }
00034 
00035         public override void Scale(SizeF scale)
00036         {
00037             StartPoint = StartPoint.Scale(scale);
00038             EndPoint = EndPoint.Scale(scale);
00039         }
00040 
00041         public override string ToString()
00042         {
00043             return string.Format("{0} => {1}", StartPoint, EndPoint);
00044         }
00045     }
00046 }
